Comment.Content:
Hi,
I was just wondering if you are still planning to write about widget implementation you mentioned in this post?
Regards, Ajay
Comment.TargetTitle: A simple solution to the Big Fat Controller problem in MVC.
Comment.Author: Ajay

Comment.Content: Yes, I have been busy with stuff at work and home. You can take a look at the source code downloading it from http://pronghorn.codeplex.com. Mind it, it's a very early version not ready for production yet, but you will be able to get a hold on how injection widgets work.
Comment.TargetTitle: A simple solution to the Big Fat Controller problem in MVC.
